description:
Shepherd`s Galvantula participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the third match and faced off against Cilan`s Pansage. The match quickly showcased Cilan`s Pansage finishing off Shepherd`s Galvantula with SolarBeam to win the battle which allowed Cilan to advance to the second round while Shepherd was eliminated from the tournament.
None of Shepherd`s Galvantula moves are known.
name: Dentula (Sugiura)
